Query:
SELECT 
    			SCTL.ID TRANSACTIONID,  
				P.PARTNERCODE AGENTCODE,
				SCTL.SOURCEMDN AGENTMOBILENUMBER,
				SCTL.DESTMDN CUSTOMERMOBILENUMBER,
				TT.TRANSACTIONNAME,
				SCTL.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT TRANSACTIONAMOUNT,
				SCTL.DESTMDN DESTINATIONACCOUNTNUMBER,
				ET.DISPLAYTEXT STATUS, 
				SCTL.FAILUREREASON STATUSREASON,
				TO_CHAR(SCTL.CREATETIME , 'DD/MM/YYYY') TRANSACTIONDATE,
				TO_CHAR(SCTL.CREATETIME , 'HH24:MI') TRANSACTIONTIME
			FROM 
				SERVICE_CHARGE_TXN_LOG SCTL,
				PARTNER P,
				TRANSACTION_TYPE TT,
				ENUM_TEXT ET
			WHERE 
				P.ID = NVL(SCTL.SOURCEPARTNERID, SCTL.DESTPARTNERID)
				AND SCTL.CHANNELCODEID = (SELECT ID FROM CHANNEL_CODE WHERE CHANNELNAME = 'WebAPI')
				AND TT.ID = SCTL.TRANSACTIONTYPEID
				AND SERVICEID IN (SELECT ID FROM SERVICE WHERE SERVICENAME IN ('AgentServices', 'Account','Wallet'))
				AND TRANSACTIONTYPEID IN 
					(SELECT ID FROM TRANSACTION_TYPE 
				    	 WHERE TRANSACTIONNAME IN ('SubscriberRegistration','CloseAccount','CashIn','CashOut','Transfer','Purchase','BillPay','AirtimePurchase','InterBankTransfer','QRPayment','B2ETransfer','E2ETransfer','E2BTransfer'))
				AND ET.TAGID='6089'
				AND ET.ENUMCODE = SCTL.STATUS
				AND SCTL.CREATETIME >= ${StartTime}
				AND SCTL.CREATETIME <= ${EndTime}
				ORDER BY SCTL.ID DESC;
